name: Black Coco
description:
This is an arcade fangame of "Black Sails" that makes absolutely no sense, with or without context! ^^

The idea actually came from a crack!fic I wrote on ao3 in which Silver drinks coconut water and then becomes crazy with want. I had a hard time writing at that time, so a friend of mine made a silly fanvid to cheer me up. In the end, this silly fanvid inspired my partner and me, and that's how this fangame was born. :)

Summary: Silver is acting strangely... Flint tries to save himself by throwing coconuts at him.

Controls: 

- Move: arrow keys

- Interact: X/W/C

Credits:

- @amethystsworld: arts & music

- @arche_san: prog, music & sfx

Music credits:

Menu theme: Black Sails theme

Main theme: Don't Take My Coconuts (Kid Creole)
